title: Red Side..im always on it.
body: Can someone please enlighten me to why im always on the red side? I really (expletive) hate it...hate it. Now since the new year i can honestly say that ive been red side 75% of my games with ease. Why is this. Also my red side win rate so much lower.

replies.body: Does anyone know where I can see how many red/blue side wins I have? and how many times I've been on each? I'd love to see a comparison.
There isn't such a thing as what side you are on doesn't really have any large impact on whether or not you win.  If it does it is extremely minimal.

Draw a Tree Diagram of Probability. Each Branch has a probability of 50% of occuring.  
     
[Probability Tree](http://www.eonhq.com/m/data/images/probability-tree-coin2.gif)

Get it?

The Chance of getting it occurring once is 50% the chance of it occurring twice is 50% x 50% = (0.5 x 0.5) = 0.125 OR 12.5%

I'm assuming the system works on the same system.
